hud-overlay.default-html: Web X-Ray Goggles activated! Press ESC to deactivate.

input.unload-blocked: You have made unsaved changes to this page.
input.link-click-blocked: If you would like to follow that link, please deactivate the goggles first by pressing ESC.

mix-master.too-big-to-change: That element is too big to remix. Try selecting a smaller one!
mix-master.too-big-to-remix-html: That <${tagName}> element is too big to remix. Try selecting a smaller one!

uproot-dialog.intro: There are two ways you can publish your remix and share it with others.
uproot-dialog.to-internet-desc: Instantly publish your remix to a URL that anyone can view.
uproot-dialog.view-html-desc: Grab the HTML source of your remix and publish it yourself.
uproot-dialog.error: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.
uproot-dialog.success: Here is the URL for your remix that anyone can view.
uproot-dialog.html-source: Here's the HTML source code of your remix.

space bar
to edit this style.

command-descriptions.css-quasimode: View/edit computed style of selected element
